message: My name is Toi Lynch and I am writing you from my school Knight Elementary. Your creation has been very popular. Yet unhealthy to people all over the world. My parents smoke and most of my family smokes. A lot have died or are suffering. I think it would be a good idea not to make as many cigarettes. You could still make a lot of money and not as many people would get sick. I hope I got my message across to you.
